item.title: Senators Demand Obama-Era Inspector General’s Cooperation In Probe Of J6 Undercover Agents
item.description: More than four years have passed since J6. It is time for all agencies involved to be transparent about their involvement that day.

item.title: Abortion Facilities Are Less Regulated Than Tattoo Parlors, And It Kills Women
item.description: Blue state legislators are more interested in pushing abortion access than they are in ensuring women’s safety.

item.title: The Leftist American Medical Association Created A Federally-Funded Cash Cow That Fuels Their Woke Agenda
item.description: The AMA's lobbying for politically charged issues like 'gender-affirming care' is all funded by American taxpayer dollars.

item.title: No, The First Amendment Doesn’t Protect Anti-American Agitation
item.description: The First Amendment is not a suicide pact between a nation and foreigners who wish it harm.

item.title: Tariffs Won’t Solve Washington’s Biggest Problem: Overspending
